text: Write-Ahead Logging: > Any change is recorded in log on stable storage before the database change is written to disk. > Must use + buffer pool policies. Repeating History During Redo: > On restart, retrace actions and restore database to exact state before crash. Logging Changes During Undo: > Record undo actions to log to ensure action is not repeated in the event of repeated failures.
